ticket.title: collection_size locals in collection partials
ticket.original-body:
This patch adds collection_size, first_in_collection and last_in_collection local assigns to partial collections.
it basicly just sets: @@@ ruby local_assigns[:collection_size] = collection.size local_assigns[:first_in_collection] = index == 0 local_assigns[:last_in_collection] = index == collection.size-1 @@@ in the render_partial_collection method.
this gives you more flexibility in designing partials that are rendered in collections.
Issues: since the local assigns are just added to partials that are renderd in collections it is not available if a single partial is rendered.
